channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Hedges, 18th May
item.description:
Need cutting and tidying up
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 34 Willowleaze, Elmbridge
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Encroaching hedges and shrubs, 18th May
item.description:
This walkway is a very busy route in the mornings as it is a vital route to Leckhampton Primary School. Unfortunately, roughly 25% of the width is taken up by shrubs and hedges growing on private property which means twice a day everyday parents and children have to stand on private land to allow others past. Clearing up access to this path would reduce the need for trespassing and trampling on residents gardens

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 4 Charnwood Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Glass on footpath/road, 18th May
item.description:
Smashed glass
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Hale's Road, Coltham Fields

item.title: Abandoned Men At Work sign outside 69 Shakespeare wrote, 18th May
item.description:
Abandoned Men At Work sign outside 69 Shakespeare Road. Can someone come and pick it up

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 71 Shakespeare Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Footpath closure, 17th May
item.description:
It appears the right of way is still closed, beyond the date posted on the notice. The footpath needs to be restored, at the moment it is dangerous to cross the field since the archaeological work on the site

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Furzen Lea Manor Road, Swindon Village
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cover pushed off all looks like electrical works outside Hobart house on Princess Elizabeth Way, 15th May
item.description:
Cover pushed off all looks like electrical works outside Hobart house on Princess Elizabeth Way. The underlying box looks to be bent out of shape by cars driving on the grass verge can somebody take a look please

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Princess Elizabeth Way, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipped Material at the location., 15th May
item.description:
The location is the Entrance to the Old Quarry off Cleeve Common Road. There is rubbish in front of the entrance wall but more importantly behind the wall which has been used as a burn area there is a quantity of plastic string / shredded material. Please can it be cleared up.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): The Dingle, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti in cut through, 14th May
item.description:
There is graffiti on a wooden fence in the path from Andover Road (near the pedestrian crossing) to Lypiatt Road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 92 Suffolk Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Deep pothole outside 27 Albemarle Road, 12th May
item.description:
This pothole is getting deeper and wider and is a menace to cyclists - the road is heavily used, especially by pupils going to and from Chosen Hill and Churchdown secondary schools, and Churchdown Village primary. It is also affecting car tyres.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 27 Albemarle Road, Churchdown
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road falling apart, 11th May
item.description:
Road in very poor condition causing vehicles to swerve to avoid
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 29a Leckhampton Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large hidden pothole, 11th May
item.description:
Pothole on the edge of the road at the brow of the hill as you leave Elkstone
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): High Cross Farm High Cross, Elkstone
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Roadside weeds, 11th May
item.description:
This problem in Newcourt Road was reported to CBC almost a year ago. To my knowledge the weeds were never killed or removed last year and are thriving again this year. There was a report of some 'mechanical' weeding device being used in favour of weedkiller but a year late the problem persists.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 25 Pinetrees, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Hedge over growing footpath dangerous for children, 10th May
item.description:
The hedge along this section of the road is taking over half the footpath. This is a route to school and makes it very dangerous to try and protect young children from traffic.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 33 Harp Hill, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet
